title: Chicken and Smoked Sausage Gumbo
ingredients: ['3 litres water', '1.35kg chicken pieces', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '675g okra', '125ml vegetable oil', '60g plain flour', '450g smoked sausage, sliced', '2 (400g) tins whole peeled plum tomatoes', '1 green pepper, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 bay leaf', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
